name: Balls Of Joy
description:
This is a basic Arcade game.. See how long you can last while trying to get as many points as possible. Touch the chest to your left to get more points, BE AWARE.. the higher the points the more difficult the game will get! Good luck and Enjoy!

This is one of my first games ever so feel free to give me some advice... besides the crappy art work .. I already know that lol
